mmd:mmd.mmd:title: SVIM ocean hindcast archive - monthly averages
mmd:mmd.mmd:abstract:
The dataset contains monthly averages from a 54 year (1958-2011) numerical ocean model hindcast archive, produced with the Regional Ocean Modeling System (ROMS). ROMS is a three dimensional baroclinic ocean general circulation model which uses topography-following s-coordinates in the vertical. This ensures high vertical resolution in shallow areas such as shelf seas and coastal areas. Here, the model is run on a grid with 32 s-layers in the vertical. In the horizontal, the grid resolution is 4 km and covers the Nordic, Barents and Kara seas, as well as parts of the Arctic Ocean. For further reading check http://www.imr.no/filarkiv/2014/01/fh_7-2013_swim_til_web.pdf
All SVIM data (daily, monthly, yearly, climatology) are currently bundled in the same location, data will be separated when a better application server is implemented.
